com.github.astefanich.exchange

Class ExchangeNetworkAdapter

  • Object
    • ExchangeNetworkAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExchangeAdapter, ExchangeListener, EventListener

    public final class ExchangeNetworkAdapter
extends Object
implements ExchangeAdapter
    Provides a network adapter for a StockExchange, which functions as our server application. (Object creation should come from ExchangeNetworkAdapterFactory).
    Author:
    AndrewStefanich
    See Also:
    ExchangeNetworkAdapterFactory, StockExchange, ExchangeEvent

        public static void setShutdownTimer(int numSeconds)

        Returns:
        the number of seconds

      • exchangeOpened

        public void exchangeOpened(ExchangeEvent event)
        The StockExchange has opened and prices are adjusting. Adds a listener to receive price change events from the real StockExchange and multicasts them to Brokers.
        Specified by:
        exchangeOpened in interface ExchangeListener
        Parameters:
        event - the ExchangeEvent

      • exchangeClosed

        public void exchangeClosed(ExchangeEvent event)
        The StockExchange has closed. Notifies clients and removes price change listener.
        Specified by:
        exchangeClosed in interface ExchangeListener
        Parameters:
        event - event the ExchangeEvent
